infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_navterminal: Strike-craft / SDV navigation chair for 'by the seat of your pants' piloting.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_cargocompar: 用于运输需要冷藏的物品的货舱，如易腐货物和生物危害性样品材料.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_weaponholde: 一个安全的存放武器的地方（需要权限）.

infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_glassdoorwb: 一扇有大窗户的滑动门，集成有两个按钮.

infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_camerasmall: 高分辨率摄像机，采用坚固的万向节，可进行大范围运动.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_cameradeco_: 用于大范围观察潜艇周围环境的专用传感器设备.

infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_portablespi: 用于消防和种植的自动喷淋装置

infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_keypad: 数字输入装置.可用于各种应用，如终端数据输入或安全代码锁.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_integraldet: 无法拆除的多通道引爆系统
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_ioterminal_: 允许船员远程操作反应堆，需要连接到对应设备以确保正常工作.
允许船员远程操作合成台，需要连接到对应设备以确保正常工作.

infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_navcomputer: 独立数据处理单元，能够执行与导航终端相同的所有操作.可用作备用指挥系统或高级无人机导航系统.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_junctiondis: (Placeholder Sprite) Heavy power distribution bus for connecting to many high-power systems throughout the submarine.
Heavy power distribution bus for connecting to many high-power systems throughout the submarine.
Heavy power distribution bus for connecting to many high-power systems throughout the submarine.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_junctionbox: Serves as a hub for power distribution and relaying signals between devices.
Serves as a hub for power distribution and relaying signals between devices.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_kineticcapa: A large flywheel and transmission system. Accumulated energy can be used to drive high-power systems like engines.
A large flywheel and transmission system. Accumulated energy can be used to drive high-power systems like engines.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_newthruster: Fixed-mount electrically driven thruster for manuvering the sub laterally. Output thrust is roughtly equivalent to that of a 50kW engine.
Fixed-mount electrically driven thruster for manuvering the sub laterally. Output thrust is roughtly equivalent to that of a 100kW engine.
Fixed-mount electrically driven thruster for manuvering the sub laterally. Output thrust is roughtly equivalent to that of a 300kW engine.
Fixed-mount electrically driven thruster for manuvering the sub laterally. Output thrust is roughtly equivalent to that of a 500kW engine.

Fixed-mount electrically driven thruster for manuvering the sub laterally. Output thrust is roughtly equivalent to that of a 1000kW engine.
Fixed-mount electrically driven thruster for manuvering the sub laterally. Output thrust is roughtly equivalent to that of a 2000kW engine.
Fixed-mount electrically driven thruster for manuvering the sub laterally. Output thrust is roughtly equivalent to that of a 300kW engine.
Fixed-mount electrically driven thruster for manuvering the sub laterally. Output thrust is roughtly equivalent to that of a 500kW engine.

infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_reactor_min: Usable device for generating electrical power. A successfull miniaturization of small-modular-reactor architecture， compact enough to see use on some shuttle craft for extended range.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_reactor_sma: Usable device for generating electrical power. An undersized reactor unit for vessels with lower power requirements.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_reactorslow: Nuclear power generation design which is designed for high-mass reaction and efficient usage of fuel at sub-critical levels.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_generatorfu: 柴油发电机使用的烃基燃料
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_fusionfuel_: 传统的聚变材料.然而，由于庞大的群体资源需求，在工业规模上生产可行的氚-氘燃料仍然是非常昂贵的.
加压的氧矿蒸汽和锂粉尘的混合物.该工艺利用了氧矿独特的物理性质，生产出易于聚变的燃料，但有效输出相对较低.
一种自然出现但分布地分散的聚变物质.有时与其他放射性矿物一起出现在大矿脉中，或是在冰冷的小行星中，使其直到最近才成为相对容易的燃料来源.
由一个外星核心供能的实验性聚变材料. 能够提供非常强劲的能源， 但具体的工作原理仍不清楚.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_reactorfusi: 使用环状托卡马克装置的小型磁约束聚变反应堆. 可以使用多种聚变燃料.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekdockyard_pumpfloor1: Small pump recessed into the floor for easy drainage.
